section.title: Overview
section.para: This module implements an embedded HTTP server using libmicrohttpd.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
none.

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para:
The following libraries or applications must be installed before running &kamailio; with this module loaded:
libmicrohttpd - libmicrohttpd library

section.title: listen_addr (int)
section.para: IPv4 address to listen for HTTP connection. If not set, then it listens on all local addresses (port has to be specified by listen_port parameter).

section.title: listen_port (int)
section.para: Port to listen for HTTP connection.

section.title: event_callback (str)
section.para: The name of the function in the kemi configuration file (embedded scripting language such as Lua, Python, ...) to be executed instead of event_route[microhttpd:request] block.
The function has one string parameter with the value "microhttpd:request".

para.emphasis: Default value is 'empty' (no function is executed for events).

example.title: Set event_callback parameter

section.para: Send back a reply with content-type and body.
The event route is executed when a new HTTP request is received.
